input_text.Prompt:
Using the item keywords and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
United States Army Three Shade Gameroom Lamp, 60"

Item keywords:
Lamp Dimensions: 14 x 14 x 9.5-Inch
Officially Licensed Art on Both Sides of Each Polyresin Lamp Shade
Metal Hardware and Chain, Cord Mounted ON/OFF Switch,2 Hanging Chains with Hanging Hardware Measure 53.5-Inch in Length Each
110V Household Outlets, Recommended Bulb Wattage: 60W (Requires 3 Bulbs, Not Included),Three Prong Cord Measures 58-Inch in Length
Overall Dimensions: 14 x 60 x 9.5-Inch

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Ensure your refrigerator is always functioning at its best with the WR71X10869 MODULE SHELF ASM FF! This genuine OEM part is designed to fit a variety of GE refrigerator models, including the PFCE1NJWBDBB, PFCF1PJXCBB, and PDSE5NBWADSS. With its durable construction and easy installation, you'll have your refrigerator back in top shape in no time.

This door bin is designed to attach to the inside of your refrigerator door, providing convenient storage for jars and bottles. Follow the instructions in your owner's manual for proper installation, and you'll be able to keep your refrigerator organized and functional.

Don't settle for anything less than the best when it comes to replacing your refrigerator parts. Trust the WR71X10869 MODULE SHELF ASM FF for a reliable and efficient solution. Order now and keep your refrigerator running like new!
input_text.Response B:
Attention all gamers! Are you looking for the perfect addition to your game room? Look no further than the United States Army Three Shade Gameroom Lamp! With its sleek design and vibrant officially licensed artwork, this lamp is sure to catch the attention of anyone who enters your room.

Not only does this lamp look great, but it's also built to last. The polyresin lamp shades are double-sided with officially licensed artwork, and the metal hardware and chains ensure that it will withstand the wear and tear of even the most intense gaming sessions. Plus, the two hanging chains with hanging hardware measure 53.5 inches in length each, making it easy to hang this lamp in any space.

Measuring 14 x 60 x 9.5 inches overall, this lamp is the perfect size for any game room. And with a recommended bulb wattage of 60W (requires 3 bulbs, not included), it will provide plenty of light for all your gaming needs.

So why wait? Add the United States Army Three Shade Gameroom Lamp to your game room today and elevate your gaming experience to the next level. With its attention-grabbing design, durable construction, and perfect size, it's sure to be the center of attention in any room. Order now and get ready to game in style!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
